identity.name: CREATIVINDUSTRY France
identity.mission: High-end visual storytelling and professional production spaces.

usage.h1: font-primary font-black tracking-tighter text-5xl md:text-7xl uppercase

grid_systems.tetris: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 md:gap-8 auto-rows-[minmax(200px,auto)]

buttons.default: rounded-none font-primary font-bold tracking-wide uppercase text-sm px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-300 hover:bg-primary hover:text-black border border-white/10
buttons.outline: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:border-primary hover:text-primary

cards.base: bg-card border border-border/40 p-6 md:p-8 rounded-none hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden

inputs.base: bg-background border-input rounded-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary focus:border-primary h-12

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) on the main background to prevent digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.gradients: NO full gradients. Use radial gradients for spotlights: 'bg-[radial-gradient(circle_at_center,_var(--tw-gradient-stops))] from-primary/10 via-background to-background'
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders with low opacity (white/10) are preferred over shadows.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Minimal usage. Use 'shadow-2xl' only for floating elements like modals.

wedding.alt: Cinematic wedding couple in black attire

motion.guidelines: Use 'lenis' for smooth scrolling. All interactive elements must have a hover state. Use staggered entrance animations for lists. Avoid 'transition-all'.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is legible on dark backgrounds. Use 'text-gray-300' for body text, not 'text-gray-500'.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings in primary color.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Force Dark Mode. Do not create a toggle. The brand is 'Dark Luxury'.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'Tetris' grid for the Landing Page. Do not stack everything in a single column.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to remove rounded corners (set radius to 0). Use sharp edges for a 'Cinema' feel.
5. ADMIN: The Admin Dashboard should be dense but legible. Use 'Table' components with 'border-b border-white/10'.
6. BOOKING: The Booking Flow must be clear. Step 1: Service Selection (Cards). Step 2: Date (Calendar). Step 3: Details (Form).
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
8. NAVIGATION: Sticky header with 'backdrop-blur-xl' and 'border-b border-white/10'.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts.
Typography: Use 'Outfit' for all headings. It gives a tech/modern feel.
Spacing: Use 'py-32' for section spacing. Give the content room to breathe.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale slightly or change border color on hover.
